content: the herringbone mixed striped throw is the perfect blanket to cozy up your living room or bed room it is also a great holiday gift that is sure to be loved by the recipient worked lengthwise with color changes this pattern will help you practice the very cool herringbone half_double_crochet stitch this skill is sure to become one of your favorites this free crochet pattern uses red heart dreamy yarn a soft feel yarn with a brushed effect work it up as shown or select the colors that work best for your living space
